name: Cult Business Enhancements
author: Doesurmindglow
description: Adds a number of enhancements to the 'cult business' mechanics.
description_long: The mod improves the chances of success for higher and highest level cultists; allows followers to work commissions; speeds up the charm mechanic and adds Favours from Authority as a potential reward; reworks augury to produce influences, with a risk of Fascination; reworks crafting to produce tools; reworks seduction to recruit hirelings, acquaintances, and patrons; and creates an alchemy mechanic that produces ingredients.
